articles.author: Max Hauptman
articles.title: Seven people, including one American, hospitalized after drinking cocktail at Fiji hotel - USA TODAY
articles.description: Seven people, including one American, were briefly hospitalized after drinking cocktails at an upscale resort bar in Fiji.
articles.content:
Seven people, including one American citizen, were hospitalized over the weekend for suspected poisoning after drinking cocktails at a hotel resort bar in Fiji, health officials said Monday.
